title: Reference Object
description: An object with a $ref property containing a JSON Pointer (RFC 6901) or URI reference. May contain additional properties alongside $ref which act as overrides to the referenced content.

$ref.description: JSON Pointer (RFC 6901) or URI reference. Examples: '#/sets/mySet' (same-document), 'path/to/tokens.json' (relative file), 'https://example.com/tokens.json' (remote URL)
